title: Pure Hospitality's Oveedia to Exhibit at Expotur 2016
text:
Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc.
LAS VEGAS , Aug. 17, Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc. , (OTC: PNOW ) announced today, that the Company is making arrangements for its Central American-Caribbean online travel hub, Oveedia (an OTA ), to be a prime exhibitor at " Expotur 2016 ", one of Central America's largest travel and industry conventions. Oveedia's exhibiting at Expotur 2016 will afford management the ability to present and network with thousands of hospitality industry executives, as Pure launches the Oveedia platform throughout the region.
"This will be the first tradeshow that we plan to attend, where we will officially be able to showcase Oveedia to industry powerhouses," stated Melvin Pereira , President and CEO of Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc. "While Oveedia will be launched imminently for beta testing, we anticipate having a flawlessly running, 2.0 version of the platform, prior to Expotur 2016. Our projections for next year's website transactions are somewhat substantial. So, the timing of this convention is perfect for the extensive regional exposure we are anticipating."
Expotur 2016 marks 30 years of uninterrupted, regional conventions, resulting in thousands of business transactions throughout the years. The Expotur conventions are organized by the Costa Rican Association of Professionals in Tourism, and brings together more than 300 tourism-based companies, in Costa Rica and throughout the Central American-Caribbean region. Oveedia's exhibiting at Expotur 2016 will help PURE develop additional professional relationships, while increasing the Company's market presence.
Pereira Concluded, " Oveedia's exhibiting at Expotur 2016, will mark yet another milestone for Pure Hospitality. We have now been acknowledged by the Costa Rican Tourism Association as an international enterprise, which can help bring additional hospitality related services and growth to the region. We plan on spending a great deal of time this next year, on becoming the true travel hub for Costa Rica , all of Central America and the Caribbean . This is the year where PURE's shareholders will finally realize what it is we have been doing behind the scenes. This is also the year where our committed shareholders will finally begin to realize the value of their confidence in us."
About Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc.
PURE provides proprietary technology, marketing solutions and branding services to hotel operators and condominium owners. The Company's vision is to build competitive operations in the areas of (i) online marketing and hotel internet booking engine services, (ii) hotel branding and, (iii) own, operate and in some instances develop, boutique hotels under the new, "by PURE" brand.
